This device can be used to grind grains into meal, flour, or malt. To use, place items into inventory and close.
This device can be used to make juices and oils from food resources. To use, place items into inventory and close.
Please keep your world clean. Place your unwanted items into this barrel.

This device can be used to craft natural resources. To use, place items into inventory and close.
This forge can be used to smelt nuggets into ingots.
This furnace has been constructed to accomodate both the delicate requirements of smelting and blowing glass into vials, bottles and flasks, and the kilning of clay molds.
The tinker's toolbox is filled with many small gadgets made from springs, gears, and wire. The clutter is actually very well organized.
The tinker's device is usually a mess. It's advised that you do not use it unless you are properly equipped.
This device will clean up a mystery mineral allowing identification.

This anvil can be used to craft weapons.
This anvil can be used to craft armor.
This bench is used to make jewelry.
This is an ATS anvil knockoff implemented with CNR.

A gem crafter's cutting and chiseling tool.
This tool is designed to break rock.

More of a tool than a weapon, the skinning knife is a handy item to carry.

This hammer is designed for use at a smithing anvil.

The book of patterns contains a large collection of pattern designs used by tailors and armor crafters to make various pieces of clothing and armor.
